entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, mentioned as giving a loud yell when he opens the package.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is also present at Christmas lunch and makes fun of Harry's gift.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Mentioned as someone who would give house-elves Christmas presents.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley's daughter-in-law, who is not wearing a new sweater at Christmas lunch.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Harry's mother figure, who has given herself a brand new midnight-blue witch's hat and a golden necklace as gifts from her sons.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends, as evident from their conversation and behavior towards each other.
Hermione is mentioned as someone who would give house-elves Christmas presents, indicating her kind nature.
Ron teases Harry about his gift of maggots, showing their playful relationship.
Fred and George give a golden necklace to Mrs. Weasley as a Christmas gift.
